7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ash'ath bin Abi Ash-Sha'tha' that his father said:"I saw Abu Hurairah, when a man passed by in the Masjid until he parted from it - after the call. Abu Hurairah said: 'This man has indeed disobeyed Abu Al-Qasim (S.A.W)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِي الْخُرُوجِ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ بَعْدَ الأَذَانِ
chapter.eng-name: The Stern Warning Against Leaving The Masjid After The Adhan
